attributes.action: enter a binding agreement not to appear in any Television Show which might further devalue the Office of Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC reports today (14th May 2008) that Minister Hazel Blears intended to raise in Cabinet the idea of Gordon Brown appearing as a judge in a "Junior PM" television series along the lines of the "Apprentice" series starring Alan Sugar.

This would devalue the office of Prime Minister by appearing to pander to the "celebrity culture" and lower the standing of Britain in the International Community.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
